group_1.textRight: After that, Momoko and I went@shopping together.
But as we were finishing up, the one thing@I never expected would have happened...did.

group_1.textLeft: Things were going great 'til about@halfway through...

group_1.textRight: ...So what're we gonna buy?@I already have a swimsuit.

group_1.textLeft: Well, the contest is taking place at the beach,@isn't it?
It'd be such a waste if we went all the way@out there just for that!
We need to enjoy ourselves and have@fun, no?

group_1.textRight: So you're thinkin' of goin' there in@the morning to play around?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Exactly! I'm quite excited for it.
Look, there's the beach goods section.@Let's go!
Hmm...
(I see, that picnic blanket has a cute@pattern...)
(Thanks to coordination,)
(I've known on a conceptual level that@she likes cute things, but now...)

group_1.textRight: Hrm...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: ...Wh...what're you chucklin' about?

group_1.textLeft: Why don't we get that panda-patterned@leisure sheet?
I think it would go well if we got a matching@parasol, too.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
But, it's...gonna get covered in sand. Wouldn't it@be better if we got something more practical?

group_1.textLeft: Would it?

group_1.textRight: ...It doesn't suit me, either.
Still, if you really want somethin' like that...
...then I guess I'm cool with that pattern.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
(She really does like cute things,@doesn't she?)
(There are so many sides to her.@It's adorable.)

group_1.textRight: What's with that look?@You think I'm bein' weird?

group_1.textLeft: I just think you're adorable.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
I see. We're not here to shop after all.
You're just here to toy with me like you@always do...

group_1.textLeft: Are you being shy, Momoko?

group_1.textRight: I am not being shy!

group_1.textLeft: But let's get back on track - how about@this float, the one with the floral print?

group_1.textRight: Oh...! It's cute.

group_1.textLeft: Or how about this? Would you prefer the@one with the nautical pattern?

group_1.textRight: Well, yeah, if we're goin' to the beach,@I figure a beach motif would be good.

group_1.textLeft: (Getting to see this side of her@in person...)
(...is so much better than simply@seeing it while coordinating her.)

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* We didn't buy anythin' in the end.

group_1.textLeft: Given our allowances, there's only@so much we can afford to spend...
That means we have to choose@carefully.

group_1.textRight: You're surprisingly good in that@department.
...Ah, reminds me, I gotta buy@some sunscreen.

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, did you forget to purchase some?

group_1.textRight: Nah, the one I typically use wasn't@in that shop.
I'm gonna try the drugstore instead.
How 'bout you?

group_1.textLeft: I've got a few things to buy, so@I'll fetch them while you're gone.

group_1.textRight: Alright, see you later, then!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's meet up back here when@we're done.

group_1.textCenter: (Scallops alone would be boring, so I'm glad@I picked these up, too.)

group_1.textRight: ...Huh? Is that you, Sis?
